import React, { FunctionComponent } from "react"; import './style.css' import openUserSign from "../../helpers/display-user"; const UserHeader: FunctionComponent = () => { const checkStatus = (string: string) => { if (string !== 'checkinfo') { if (false) { openUserSign(string) } else { document.querySelector('.user-window__bloc__' + string)!.classList.add("error") } } else { openUserSign(string) } } return (

checkStatus("in")}>Sign In

checkStatus("up")}>Sign Up

checkStatus("close")}>

Email

password

checkStatus("checkinfo")}> Sign In

Pseudo

Email

password

Confirm password

checkStatus("checkinfo")}> Sign Up
) } export default UserHeader;
